body:
Comment 5: 
I've made some sort of mistake in the original description; this issue is unrelated to
7132. I'm not sure why I thought it was.

Also, the passing test at the bottom was meant to be for
code.google.com/p/go.tools/astutil, not code.google.com/p/go.tools/imports.

Finally, I'm not completely sure if this bugfix is okay with the 1.3 freeze in mind.
Sorry if not. I thought I'd submit the CL in order to find out.
